properties.title: Java Pairing-Based Cryptography Library : Docs - Android
properties.author: Angelo De Caro

body.section: JPBC (the porting) runs out of box on android. Download the following apk to benchmark jpbc on your terminal. One the benchmark is finished the results can be found on the external memory in a file called "benchmark.out". If you donâ€™t mind it sending me the results, with a description of the characteristic of the terminal used, please contact me.
